casebody.data:
CORWIN
v.
BRITISH AMERICAN TOBACCO PLC, et al. 56PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 5, 2017 Alan W. Duncan, Attorney at Law, Stephen M. Russell, Jr., Attorney at Law, Jason M. Leviton, Attorney at Law, Joel A. Fleming, Attorney at Law, for Corwin, Robert (Dr.), et al. Michael L. Robinson, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, H. Brent Helms, Attorney at Law, Gary A. Bornstein, Attorney at Law, for British American Tobacco PLC. Ronald R. Davis, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, W. Andrew Copenhaver, Attorney at Law, James A. Dean, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Robert C. Micheletto, Attorney at Law, Thomas E. Lynch, Attorney at Law, Andrew S. Kleinfeld, Attorney at Law, for Reynolds American, Inc., et al. James P. McLoughlin, Jr., Attorney at Law, Mark A. Nebrig, Attorney at Law, Jonathan M. Watkins, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Karen Seymour, Attorney at Law, Frank Schall, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Jobin, Luc, et al.

*667The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of July 2017 by Defendant (British American Tobacco PLC):

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of July 2017."

Defendant (British American Tobacco PLC) shall have up to and including the 20th day of July 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
